pr_title: HIVE-24168: Disable hdfsEncryptionShims cache during query-based comp…

timeline.message: HIVE-24168: Disable hdfsEncryptionShims cache during query-based compaction

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't isCompactionTable return true in both cases? Isn't it a problem the other places we use this util, that the mmCompactionTable are missed?
timeline.author: pvargacl

replies.bodyText:
isCompactionTable logically would be true for both full acid and mm tables, but until now we've only used it to mark tables used for compacting full acid tables. AFAIK we don't want to apply the operations we do on full acid compaction tables to mm compaction tables.
I could rename isCompactionTable() to isFullAcidCompactionTable() for easier reading, would that do?
replies.author: klcopp

timeline.bodyText: Would it make sense to include the hashes for the fs instances in the debug logs?
timeline.author: zchovan

replies.bodyText: I think only in hdfs-common (FS.close() et al) – I opened HADOOP-17267 to track it.
replies.author: klcopp

timeline.message: Return null (previous behavior) if FS URI schema is not hdfs
